title: Typeface for adventure show
content:
Hi,

My friend is doing a lower budget, I say this cause its a low budget but its not to look cheap, adventure show where he travels the world. Sort of like Indiana Jones meets a regular travel - see/learn about the locations- type of thing.

I unfortunately keep relying on my old tried and trues.

Wondering if anyone had some suggestions that would spark something.

Thanks in advance!
author: disgusting

comments.content: A few ideas: [Olduvai](http://web.archive.org/web/20110314164957/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000054#flont), [Zanzibar](http://web.archive.org/web/20110314164957/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000069#flont), and [Incognito](http://web.archive.org/web/20110314164957/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000074#specimen). I'm not sure if I feel that any of them would be ideal, though.
